001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.service;
002
003import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
004import android.content.Context;
005import android.content.Intent;
006import android.content.res.Resources;
007import android.util.Log;
008import androidx.activity.result.ActivityResult;
009import androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultLauncher;
010import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignIn;
011import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInAccount;
012import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInClient;
013import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInOptions;
014import com.google.android.gms.auth.api.signin.GoogleSignInOptions.Builder;
015import com.google.android.gms.common.api.ApiException;
016import com.google.android.gms.tasks.Task;
017import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
019import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
020import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Scheduler;
021import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
022import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.SingleEmitter;
023import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
024import javax.inject.Inject;
025import javax.inject.Singleton;
026
027@Singleton
028public class GoogleSignInService {
029
030  private static final String BEARER_TOKEN_FORMAT = "Bearer %s";
031  private final GoogleSignInClient client;
032
033  @Inject
034  GoogleSignInService(@ApplicationContext Context context){
035    Resources res = context.getResources();
036    @SuppressLint("DiscouragedApi")
037    int identifier = res.getIdentifier("service_client_id","string", context.getPackageName());
038    String clientId = (identifier != 0) ? res.getString(R.string.service_client_id) : null; //service_client is in local.properties in Gradle scripts
039    GoogleSignInOptions.Builder builder = new Builder()
040        .requestEmail()
041        .requestId()
042        .requestProfile(); //get photo
043    if(clientId != null && !clientId.isEmpty()){
044      builder.requestIdToken(clientId);
045    }
046    client = GoogleSignIn.getClient(context, builder.build());
047  }
048
049  //Refresh account
050  public Single<GoogleSignInAccount> refresh(){
051    return Single.create((SingleEmitter<GoogleSignInAccount> emitter) ->
052        client.silentSignIn()
053            .addOnSuccessListener(emitter::onSuccess)
054            //.addOnSuccessListener((account) -> Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), account.getIdToken())) // FIXME: 10/30/23 Get rid of this after testing.
055            .addOnFailureListener(emitter::onError)
056
057        )
058        .observeOn(Schedulers.io());
059  }
060  public Single<String> refreshBearerToken(){
061    return refresh()
062        .map((account) -> String.format(BEARER_TOKEN_FORMAT,account.getIdToken()));
063  }
064
065  public void startSignIn(ActivityResultLauncher<Intent> launcher){
066    launcher.launch(client.getSignInIntent());
067  }
068
069  public Single<GoogleSignInAccount> completeSignIn(ActivityResult result){
070    return Single.create((SingleEmitter<GoogleSignInAccount> emitter) -> {
071          try {
072            Task<GoogleSignInAccount> task =
073                GoogleSignIn.getSignedInAccountFromIntent(result.getData());
074            GoogleSignInAccount account = task.getResult(ApiException.class);
075            emitter.onSuccess(account);
076            //Log.d(getClass().getSimpleName(), account.getIdToken()); Only use for development.
077          } catch (ApiException e) {
078            emitter.onError(e);
079          }
080        })
081        .observeOn(Schedulers.io());
082  }
083  public Completable signOut(){
084    return Completable.create((emitter) ->
085        client
086            .signOut()
087            .addOnSuccessListener((ignored) -> emitter.onComplete())
088            .addOnFailureListener(emitter::onError)
089        )
090        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
091  }
092}
